monetico_settings.label: Common Settings
monetico_settings.comment: These data are common for all payment methods through Monetico.

canceled_redirect_cart.label: Redirect to the Cart after Cancellation
canceled_redirect_cart.comment: We will redirect the customer to the default failure page if the redirect option is disabled.

canceler_error_message.label: Cancellation Message
canceler_error_message.comment: We will replace the default message on the failure page by this one.

use_cron_cancel.label: Enable Automatic Cancellation
use_cron_cancel.comment: We will run a cron to cancel orders, in new status, older than the value you have configured.

cancel_delay.label: Delay Before Cancellation
cancel_delay.comment: The value is the number of days before the order is canceled.

debug_mode.label: Enable Debug Mode
debug_mode.comment: We will trace the events in the /var/log/monetico.log file.

monetico_onetime.label: One-time Payment
monetico_onetime.comment: The purchases are fully paid in one time.

monetico_required.label: API Monetico Settings
monetico_required.comment: These information are available in your Monetico account.

use_iframe.label: Include in Iframe
use_iframe.comment: You should have signed the option in your Monetico contract.

locale.label: Locale Configuration
locale.comment: We will use the current store language in preference.

monetico_transaction.label: Transaction Description
monetico_transaction.comment:
You can customize the transaction description, these variables can be used:

  • %order_id%Order ID number
  • %payment_method%Payment Method name
  • %code_societe%Store Code Name

transaction_description.label: Transaction Message
transaction_description.comment: We will set a default message if the value is empty.

monetico_options.label: Options Settings
monetico_options.comment: Enable or disable Monetico options and configure them.

payment_express.label: Enable the Payment Express Option
payment_express.comment: You should have signed the option in your Monetico contract.

allow_options.label: Enable all Payment Options
allow_options.comment: We will display the payment options on the Monetico payment page, from your settings.

monetico_multitime.label: Multi-time Payment
monetico_multitime.comment: The purchases are paid in several times.

monetico_required_multi.label: API Monetico Settings
monetico_required_multi.comment: These information are available in your Monetico account.

monetico_several_payment.label: Several Payment Configuration
monetico_several_payment.comment: We will split equally the payment in many capture amount if the values are empty. The total terms rate should be equal to 100%.

number_terms.label: Number of Payment Terms
number_terms.comment: We will process the payment in many several monthly captures.

term_rate_1.label: 1st Rate Term (%)
term_rate_1.comment: We will capture this order rate amount on the first term.

term_rate_2.label: 2nd Rate Term (%)
term_rate_2.comment: We will capture this order rate amount on the second term.

term_rate_3.label: 3rd Rate Term (%)
term_rate_3.comment: We will capture this order rate amount on the third term.

term_rate_4.label: 4th Rate Term (%)
term_rate_4.comment: We will capture this order rate amount on the fourth term.

locale.label: Locale Configuration
locale.comment: We will use the current store language in preference.

monetico_transaction_multi.comment:
You can customize the transaction description, these variables can be used:

  • %order_id%Order ID number
  • %payment_method%Payment Method name
  • %code_societe%Store Code Name

transaction_description.label: Transaction Message
transaction_description.comment: We will set a default message if the value is empty.

monetico_options_multi.label: Options Settings
monetico_options_multi.comment: Enable or disable Monetico options and configure them.

payment_express.label: Enable the Payment Express Option
payment_express.comment: You should have signed the option in your Monetico contract.

monetico_3xcb.label: Cofidis 3xCB Payment
monetico_3xcb.comment: The purchases are paid in 3 times by the customer, but the merchant is paid in one time.

active.comment:

The One-time payment method should be configured.

monetico_4xcb.label: Cofidis 4xCB Payment
monetico_4xcb.comment: The purchases are paid in 4 times by the customer, but the merchant is paid in one time.

monetico_paypal.comment: PayPal is a worldwide payment method.
